greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the k-th prime = -1 (mod n), 1 <= k <= n.
mathematica: row[n_] := Reap[Module[{k, p}, For[k = 0; p = n - 1, k < n, p += n, If[PrimeQ[p], k++; Sow[p]]]]][[2, 1]];
xref: Cf. A077316, A038700 (first column), A093871 (main diagonal).
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 20 2004
ext: Edited and extended by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 29 2006
Duplicate term 139 removed by _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 08 2020
